document_data.name: Imglor Ironhand
document_data.mainbody: '''Imglor Ironhand''' was a slayer-for-hire in [[Cormyr]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Abilities: He was excellent at assassination, and at making things resemble accidents.
document_data.Relationships: He had been hired by [[Manshoon]], who used spells to share in, see and hear what he saw and heard.
document_data.History: In the {{yearlinkName|1479}}, the [[vampire]] [[archmage]] [[Manshoon]] hired Imglor for a considerable sum in order to find the master of the [[Blueflame ghost]] revealed during the disastrous [[Council of the Dragon]]. The man spied on Lord [[Harkuldragon (Lord)|Harkuldragon]], whom Manshoon believed might be holding one such. Imglor was eavesdropping on them plotting the murder of [[Khaladan Mallowfaer]] through an open window from a nearby roof when they witnessed the sorceress [[Cymmarra]] murdering Harkuldragon and his mage [[Sarrak]].
